full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHYAG RDOR GOS SNGON CAN GYI SGRUB THABS DANG RGYAL CHEN RNAM THOS SRAS LA BRTEN NAS BYIN 'BEBS DANG GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE GOS SNGON CAN GYI SGRUB THABS DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD CES PA 'DI NI RNAM SRAS KYI CHO GA'I YAN LAG TU ZHVA SER COD PAn 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
